tool_description: An API showing a rollerskating specific list of tricks performed on transition or skatepark obstacles.
name: Rollerskate Tricktionary API
title: Rollerskate Tricktionary API

api_list.name: Get tricks filtered by trick category
api_list.description: Get tricks filtered by trick category
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rollerskate-tricktionary-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/tricks/category/Stalls"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rollerskate-tricktionary-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rollerskate-tricktionary-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/tricks/category/{category}"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all rollerskating tricks
api_list.description: This endpoints will return back all rollerskating tricks.
